## Installation 

<iframe width="1050" height="600" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/qlLsf27pG_w" title="installing scikit-rom [v1.0.0]" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>

This tutorial explains how to install SKROM (scikit-ROM):

Installation Steps:

  1.Clone the repository:

  ```bash
  Copy
  Edit
  git clone [GitHub URL]
  cd scikit-rom
  ```

  2.Install with pip:

  - For developers (editable install):

  ```bash
  Copy
  Edit
  pip install -e .
  ```

  - For regular users:

  ```bash
  Copy
  Edit
  pip install .
  ```

(Use pip3 instead of pip on Mac)

Notes

  - Use `-e` for development; it lets you edit the code without reinstalling.
  - Regular users should use standard installation.
  - Reinstallation automatically removes the old version.
  - The installation completes in seconds and shows “successfully built SKROM.”
  - All instructions are available on the GitHub page.
